Date

Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • Date.Date

  • public class Date
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Jean-Luc Desroches

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Date()
      Empty Constructor, initializes the date to January 1, 2013
      Date(int dayOfYear, int year)
      Construct the date using the day of the year and the year
      Date(int month, int day, int year)
      Construct date object using the month, day and year
      Date(java.lang.String monthName, int day, int year)
      Construct the date using the name of the month, the day and the year

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Constructor Detail

      • Date

        public Date()
        Empty Constructor, initializes the date to January 1, 2013

      • Date

        public Date(int month,
    int day,
    int year)
        Construct date object using the month, day and year
        Parameters:
        month - Integer: Month of the year, ranges 1-12
        day - Integer: Day of the month, ranges 1-30/31 depending on the month
        year - Integer: Year in yyyy format, limited between 1900-2013

      • Date

        public Date(java.lang.String monthName,
    int day,
    int year)
        Construct the date using the name of the month, the day and the year
        Parameters:
        monthName - String: Name of the month
        day - Integer: Day of the month to set
        year - Integer: Year to set

      • Date

        public Date(int dayOfYear,
    int year)
        Construct the date using the day of the year and the year
        Parameters:
        dayOfYear - Integer: Day of the year
        year - Integer: Year to be set
